de.javasoft.swing.plaf.jycombobox
Class ComponentPopup

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboPopup
                      de.javasoft.swing.plaf.jycombobox.ComponentPopup
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.AWTEventListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement, javax.swing.plaf.basic.ComboPopup
public class ComponentPopup
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboPopup
implements java.awt.event.AWTEventListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener

PopupMenu for JYComboBox with the ability to set a custom component as content (see JYComboBox.setPopupComponent(JComponent)).

Optional UI-properties:

  • JYComboBox.resizeHandle.size - Integer, height of the resize handle, default value is 7.
  • JYComboBox.resizeHandle.edgeSize - Integer, width for the resize edge, default value is 16.
  • JYComboBox.resizeHandle.opaque - Boolean, resize handle opacity, default value is true.

    • Version:
    1.11, 22.09.2010
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
